what: shiny App Companion to the tfrmt Package
title: shiny App Companion to the tfrmt Package
text: {tfrmt} package provides language defining display-related metadata, can used automate easily update output formats. {tfrmtbuilder} serves interface package, allowing users quickly easily modify existing new table templates.

title: shiny App Companion to the tfrmt Package
text: Like {tfrmt}, {tfrmtbuilder} can used support variety workflows, including following: Creating tables scratch Create tables based template Modifying existing table Additionally, {tfrmtbuilder} supports tables created study planning (mock tables) later analysis complete.

title: shiny App Companion to the tfrmt Package
text: top app, use toggle specify whether generating mock (data values) table data values. Load existing {tfrmt} (JSON) start fresh Auto [mock ]: Use auto-generated mock data Note: ‘mock’ mode, serve shell numeric data value column ignored Example [mock ]: Use pre-loaded example dataset Select ARD column mappings Format table via ‘plans’ functionality View table modify Download {tfrmt} metadata (JSON) Download {tfrmt} table (HTML, PNG)

title: shiny App Companion to the tfrmt Package
text: {tfrmtbuilder} can installed used following code:
code: # development version devtools::install_github("GSK-Biostatistics/tfrmtbuilder")  # from CRAN install.packages("tfrmtbuilder")  # Load app library(tfrmtbuilder) tfrmtbuilder()

title: shiny App Companion to the tfrmt Package
text: Example app {tfrmt} User Guide {tfrmt} GitHub Repository

tfrmtbuilder 0.0.6
text: CRAN release: 2024-03-30 Add support page_plan Add support additional output formats: rtf, docx, pdf Add support .xpt data files Add ability expand collapse table preview “Edit” tab Addition JSON examples “Load” tab Fix navbar link underline css conflict support bslib >= 0.6.0 Fix issue buttons “Load” tab overlapped smaller screens Fix issue sorting cols selections trigger activation/glow save/refresh buttons properly

title: tfrmtbuilder 0.0.5
text: CRAN release: 2023-10-20 Improve robustness tfrmt internal functions called.

title: tfrmtbuilder 0.0.4
text: CRAN release: 2023-09-13 First release CRAN

title: tfrmtbuilder 0.0.3
text: Allow param-level formatting body_plan() Fix issue user unable select frmt buttons body_plan() via installed package fix navbar warnings extra content

title: tfrmtbuilder 0.0.2
text: Persistent mapping selections additional inputs added Informing user “save” button yet pressed Mock mode toggle nav bar rather load tab

title: tfrmtbuilder 0.0.1
text: First release
